translations.english: Emperor Gaozu was drunk and said: "A brave man walks on. What is there to fear!"
So he went forward and drew his sword to cut the snake.
The snake split into two, and the path opened.
He walked several li, then lay down drunk and exhausted.

translations.chinese: 後人來至蛇所，有一老嫗夜哭。
translations.english: Later people came to the place where the snake was, and there was an old woman crying at night.
